from.title: From
from.description: Currency code this will be converted from.

to.title: To
to.description: Currency code this exchange rate will convert into.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: How much is 1 of the "from" currency worth in the "to" currency.

at.title: At
at.description:
At represents the date and time (which may be 00:00:00) when the
currency rate amount was determined.

ExchangeRate.description: ExchangeRate contains data on the rate to be used when converting amounts from one currency into another.
